document_data.name: Arellaxerrontoal
document_data.mainbody: '''Arellaxerrontoal''' was an [[bronze dragon]] living in [[Forest of Tethir]] and the regional agent of the [[Moonstars]] for [[Amn]] and [[Tethyr]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History: Arellaxerrontoal was a bronze dragon living in Forest of Tethir with her mate in the past; at one point the [[blue dragon]] [[great wyrm]] [[Iryklathagra]] killed her mate. For a long time she was consumed by revenge. Arellaxerrontoal's work for the Moonstars alleviated her pains.
document_data.Personality: Arellaxerrontoal believe that the unity of humanity and elves that the Moonstars hope to achieve can bring the demise of all evil dragons, like the killer of their mate.
